name: Chocobo Dice Dungeon
description:
Roll the dice to get through 4 different dungeons in this Final Fantasy themed roguelite made in RPG Maker MV. Fight enemies like Goblins, Tonberries, and Malboros. Save up gil to buy stat upgrades, new equipment, and magicite.

Chocobo sprites belong to strangedragon81.
Music and enemy graphics copyright Square Enix.
